actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit veterans to determine how certain drugs and medicines will be supplied to them.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to permit a veteran, who is being supplied with drugs but who is not a patient in a Veterans' Administration facility, to determine whether the drugs will be supplied directly by the Administrator or from a source approved by the Administrator and whether the Administrator shall pay such source directly or reimburse the veteran who will pay for the drugs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit veterans to determine how certain drugs and medicines will be supplied to them.
